manifest_description.message: Recompensa los autores en la web directamente com Bitcoin Cash y sin necesitar de confiar en intermediarios

manifest_default_title.description: The default title of the extension's button in the toolbar

popup_period_back.description: Tooltip for the button taking the user to the previous period

popup_period_forward.description: Tooltip for the button taking the user to the next period

popup_settings.description: Tooltip for the button taking the user to the settings page

action_toggle_automatic.description: Tooltip for the button that toggles manual state when the entry is manual

action_toggle_manual.description: Tooltip for the button that toggles manual state when the entry is automatic

action_ban.description: Tooltip for the button that removes the entry from the list permanently

popup_contribute.description: Text for the popup button that takes the user to the contribution page

date_from_to.description: Presents the date range of a period in a user readable way

date_since.description: Presents the start of a period in a user readable way

options_title.description: Title of the options page, which includes the extension name

options_header.message: Configuraciones de la Extensión Brave Heart
options_header.description: Header text in the options page

options_currency_label.description: Field label for selecting the currency

options_exclusions_description.message: Lista de direcciones web que han sido exlcluidas y no son más presentadsa como parte de los sitios visitados durante el período. Recuperar la dirección web hará con que el sitio sea de nuevo presenado en las listas con su utilización actualizada.
options_exclusions_description.description: Description of the exclusions section with explanation that it shows addresses excluded from the popup and that those can be restored

options_restore.description: Text for for the restore button

contribute_title.description: Title of the contribution page, which includes the extension name

contribute_header_normal.description: Title for the contribution page header before payment is made

contribute_header_paid.description: Title for the contribution page header after the payment is made

contribute_title_view_tx.description: Text for the link taking the user to the blochain explorer to see the transaction details

contribute_amount_label.description: Text for the label next to the standard amount the user can chose for the contribution

contribute_pay.description: Text for the button that allows the user to initiate the contribution payment

contribute_empty.message: Ninguno sitio que soporte Bitcoin Cash ha sido visitado in el período activo.
contribute_empty.description: Message show to user when there are no entries to contribute to

contribute_pay_title.description: Title of the payment popup with the QR code

contribute_pay_text.message: Para iniciar el pago por favor escanee el código QR con una cartera. También puedes clicar en uno de los botones abajo para utilizar una aplicación local.
contribute_pay_text.description: Descriptive text for the payment popup with instructoins for the user

contribute_pay_received.description: Message shown to user when the transaction is received

contribute_pay_copy.description: Text for the copy button next to the payment QR code

contribute_pay_copy_message.description: Text shown when the user clicks in copy that acts as confirmation of the action
